attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is set to increase Tax for lower earners and decrease it for the higher paid people of Britain, this culture of Rich looking after the Rich must stop, surely we should be helping the people with lower wages to keep as much of their money in their pockets rather than push them further into poverty and as a knock on effect increase crime rates as people cannot support themselves anymore.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
